Source.Name: upx
Source.Description: Free, portable, extendable, high-performance executable packer for several executable formats. UPX achieves an excellent compression ratio and offers very fast decompression. Your executables suffer no memory overhead or other drawbacks for most of the formats supported, because of in-place decompression.

Package.Name: upx
Package.Description: Free, portable, extendable, high-performance executable packer for several executable formats. UPX achieves an excellent compression ratio and offers very fast decompression.
